original_text: And the multitude rose up together against them: and the magistrates rent off their clothes, and commanded to beat them.
korean_text: 무리가 일제히 일어나 고발하니 상관들이 옷을 찢어 벗기고 매로 치라 하여

sentences.original_text: And the multitude rose up together against them
and the magistrates rent off their clothes
